source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT  table_schema, table_name FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE table_type = 'base table' and table_schema='SalesLT'
SELECT  table_schema, table_name FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE table_type = 'base table' and table_schema='SalesLT'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select 
data_source_table1.PersonID,
data_source_table1.Name,
data_source_table1.Age,
CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION,
 SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from data_source_table1 
 RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES data_source_table1, @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on data_source_table1.PersonID = CT.PersonID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		eid as string,
		ename as string,
		sal as string,
		deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		deptname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 join(source1@deptid == source2@deptid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		eid as string,
		ename as string,
		sal as string,
		deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empsource
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		deptname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> deptsource
empsource, deptsource lookup(empsource@deptid == deptsource@deptid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		eid,
		ename,
		sal,
		deptid = empsource@deptid,
		deptname
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 window(over(deptid),
	desc(toInteger(sal), true),
	rank = rank()) ~> Window1
Window1 filter(equals(rank, 1)) ~> Filter1
Select1 rank(desc(toInteger(sal), true),
	output(rank as long),
	dense: true) ~> DenseRank1
Select1 rank(desc(toInteger(sal), true),
	output(rank as long)) ~> Rank2
Select1 keyGenerate(output(sk as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 alterRow(insertIf(equals(deptid,'101')),
	deleteIf(equals(deptid,'102'))) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 select(mapColumn(
		eid,
		ename,
		sal,
		deptid,
		deptname,
		sk
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2

source(output(
		eid as string,
		ename as string,
		sal as string,
		deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empsource
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		deptname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> deptsource
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		ename,
		sal,
		deptid = deptsource@deptid,
		deptname
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
empsource, deptsource lookup(empsource@deptid == deptsource@deptid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(deptid),
	total = sum(toInteger(sal))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		eid as string,
		ename as string,
		sal as string,
		deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empsource
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		deptname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> deptsource
empsource, deptsource lookup(empsource@deptid == deptsource@deptid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		eid,
		ename,
		sal,
		deptid = empsource@deptid,
		deptname
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 split(equals(deptid, '101'),
	equals(deptid, '102'),
	equals(deptid, '103'),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(dept101, dept102, dept103, default)
ConditionalSplit1@dept101, ConditionalSplit1@dept102, ConditionalSplit1@dept103, ConditionalSplit1@default union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2

source(output(
		Sno as string,
		Date as string,
		Time as string,
		{State/UnionTerritory} as string,
		ConfirmedIndianNational as string,
		ConfirmedForeignNational as string,
		Cured as string,
		Deaths as string,
		Confirmed as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> covid19source
covid19source select(mapColumn(
		Sno,
		Date,
		{State/UnionTerritory},
		Cured,
		Deaths,
		Confirmed
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		eid as string,
		ename as string,
		sal as string,
		deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empsource
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		deptname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> deptsource
empsource, deptsource join(empsource@deptid == deptsource@deptid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		ename,
		sal,
		deptid = deptsource@deptid,
		deptname
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive({ branch} = 'Bangalore') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 filter(greater(toInteger(sal),5000)) ~> FilterBySal
FilterBySal sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ename,
		sal,
		deptid,
		deptname
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		sid as integer,
		sname as string,
		courses as string[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(courses),
	mapColumn(
		sid,
		sname,
		courses
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		sid as string,
		sname as string,
		courses as string,
		address as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 parse(ParsedCourses = courses ? (course1 as string,
		course2 as string,
		course3 as string),
	format: 'delimited',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	columnDelimiter: '|',
	nullValue: '') ~> ParseedCourses
ParseedCourses parse(ParsedAddress = address ? (city as string,
		state as string),
	format: 'json',
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> ParseedAddress
ParseedAddress select(mapColumn(
		sid,
		sname,
		course1 = ParsedCourses.course1,
		course2 = ParsedCourses.course2,
		course3 = ParsedCourses.course3,
		city = ParsedAddress.city,
		state = ParsedAddress.state
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		sid as string,
		sname as string,
		subjects as string,
		marks as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		sid as string,
		sname as string,
		azure as string,
		bi as string,
		etl as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1 pivot(groupBy(sid),
	pivotBy(subjects),
	total = sum(toInteger(marks)),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
source2 unpivot(output(
		subject as string,
		marks as string
	),
	ungroupBy(sid,
		sname),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: true) ~> Unpivot1
Pivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		deptid as string,
		deptname as string
	),
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
